name: Smartarget Contact Form
author: Smartarget

sections.description:
Allow users to contact you easily with Smartarget – Contact Form
Make it easy for your site visitors to contact you through their mobile and desktop from anywhere on your website.
Users might have a question or need your support and you should make it very visible to contact you. With Smartarget – Contact Form you can have the contact form on all your pages in a visible way. You can also use it to collect emails for newsletter.
Smartarget Contact Form plugin works also with WooCommerce, Elementor and Oxygen Builder.

Smartarget Contact Form Pro Features:

Pro version overcomes your limitations with lite version of Smartarget Contact Form.

Smartarget Contact Form PRO Plugin Features

  • Apps visibility on all pages
  • No Smartarget label

BUY Smartarget Contact Form Pro Features : Buy Now
sections.installation:
1. Unpack plugin zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Open plugin settings page
  4. Configure settings and press Save
sections.faq:
Where I can create Smartarget account

You can create account here: Smartarget.online
